title: LF>Marksman players/Team (Diamond V Support)
body:
Hey community,

My name is Aycorn and i'm currently a Diamond V fill main, leaning towards playing support most games if I can get it.

My friends list is hella empty and I would love to have some new Marksman players to duo/normal with!

Also, if any Plat+  teams are looking for a support player feel free to add me in-game as-well.

**IGN: Aycorn**

_Danke~_

replies.body: Hey dude, I added you in game, I used to mostly main Mid Lane, but as of late I've switched to ADC, and I'd be happy to play some normals with you if you wanted to :)
